extendedInfo.description: Note: This is a plugin for Active lockscreen. this is not an independent application, please download the latest  "Active lockscreen" version to activate the plugin.The headlines are updated in real time ! Drag the headlines to the ring on the bottom of your screen, and a page will open with the full list of headlines as received directly from "All Recipes".To download the RSS Plugin âAll Recipesâ for Active lockscreen,  follow the  instructions below:1.	Press âInstallâ button 2.	Press âDownloadâ 3.	Follow further instructions -This Plugin is an RSS reader and it defines the configuration of the RSS to Active lockerâs screen . This RSS feed is powered by âAll Recipesâ

reviews.title: Yeah, me too  =(
reviews.comment: I love the phone app (not so much the spinner) and the site even though they don\'t synch for some reason, but I don\'t want a management app/interface on my tablet.  Too bad; this really is the best recipe site in my honest opinion.
reviews.author: Ryan Grove

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I love this app on my iphone and I am very disappointed that I cannot use it on my tablet because the active lock screen app I need to run this isnt compatable with my tablet
reviews.author: Jennifer Evanilla

reviews.title: 2nd app!!!
reviews.comment: I love all recipe BUT I do not want to download another app just to use it....I\'m not using this one!!
reviews.author: jessica leal

reviews.title: Boooo
reviews.comment: I as well hate that I have to download another app just to use this one....as told by many others
reviews.author: Kimberly Morris

reviews.title: Hate the requirement for additional app
reviews.comment: I love allrecipes, but hate the idea that I have to download an additional app for this app to even open.  I\'ll pass on this one...
reviews.author: Shean D

reviews.comment: Not downloading another app just to use this one
reviews.author: Lamar Ethington
